column4: hello. how can i specify a smtp server to use with 'sendmail' or 'mail' command?
Umm, Sendmail IS a SMTP server...
btw... take a look at 'ssmtp' (double s on purpose) ... it is an MTA that forwards to your e-mail account automatically from system tools.
Ok, postfix is not supposed to forward to anything else, it is your own smtp server... do you have your own website etc?
